original_title: No arrest yet over murder of Cheeky Monkey restaurant owner
original_body_lines: The Midigama Police has launched investigations to arrest the suspects wanted over the shooting of the owner of Cheeky Monkey restaurant in Midigama.

The 32-year-old victim, Pasindu Sandaruwan, a resident of Midigama, succumbed to injuries early this morning after he was shot by a gunman who arrived in a van with a group of unidentified individuals last night. The vehicle  used by the suspects for the shooting was found in the Panugalgoda area a few hours after the incident.
Police said the restaurant owner was shot at with a T56 assault riffle when he was sitting on a mortocycle outside his restaurant. It is reported he had been shot several times in the stomach.
Police said investigations are underway to determine the cause of the shooting and to arrest the suspects.(Darshana Sanjeewa Balasuriya)
